author: Omkar Ramgirwar
description: A quick and delicious grilled sandwich stuffed with spicy paneer filling, perfect for breakfast or evening snacks.
instructions: Heat 1 tablespoon butter or oil in a pan.
Add onion, tomato, and green chili; sauté until soft.
Add red chili powder, turmeric, garam masala, and salt; mix well.
Add crumbled paneer and cook for 2–3 minutes. Stir in coriander leaves and turn off the heat.
Spread butter on the bread slices and place the paneer filling between two slices.
Grill or toast the sandwich until golden and crisp.
Cut into halves or triangles and serve hot with ketchup or green chutney.
